Dear Gautam Naik,

With great pleasure, I would like to extend the following employment offer.

Position: Frontend Developer
Start date: 22nd Oct 2023
Salary: 50 LPA

This employment offer is contingent upon completing [background check, drug screening, reference check, I-9 form, etc.]. This offer is not a contract of employment, and either party may terminate employment at any time, with or without cause.

Sincerely,

[Your Signature]

CEO

Candidate Signature: ______________________________

Candidate Printed Name: ______________________________

Date: ______________________________
